section_summary: The text is an introduction to the challenges facing Kuwait and the role of the National Assembly in addressing these challenges. It emphasizes the importance of cooperation between the government and the National Assembly to remove obstacles and achieve national development. The text also calls for the promotion of democratic practices, focusing on the supervisory role of the National Assembly and giving the government sufficient time to accomplish its tasks. It highlights the importance of social justice and the development of the country's resources, as well as the need for responsible decision-making in line with national interests. The text is from the first regular session of the seventeenth legislative term, dated June 20, 2023.
